_Defines how revenue is generated over time, ethically and sustainably._

## Includes

* _Monetization model (premium, hybrid, battle pass, cosmetics, expansions)_
* _In-game economy design_
* _Pricing tiers & currency structures_
* _Seasonal/battle pass pacing & rewards_
* _KPI targets (ARPU, retention, conversion)_
* _Regulatory compliance (loot box laws, gambling rules)_
* _Consumer protection & ethical guidelines_
